name: hci-ng-grid-dto
description: DTOs for filtering, sorting, paging and grouping information related to grids and lists for backend calls.

scripts.clean: npm run rimraf index.js index.d.ts index.ngsummary.json index.metadata.json index.js.map src/**/*.js src/**/*.ngfactory.ts src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.js.map src/**/*.ngsummary.json src/**/*.metadata.json code-coverage dist
scripts.copyToDist: npm run copyfiles -- package.json README.md dist/
scripts.npmPack: npm run build && npm run copyToDist && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.npmPublish: npm run build && npm run copyToDist && cd dist && npm publish --access public
